canonical_rules.description: Member must have a documented diagnosis from Category A or B
At least one clinical finding documented on physical exam within 30 days
Weight-bearing radiographs completed within 60 days, report available
At least 2 of 5 conservative treatment modalities completed over minimum 6 weeks
Pediatric orthopedic evaluation and growth plate assessment (age < 18 only)
Functional impact and surgical candidacy assessment (age ≥ 65 only)
Acute traumatic injury exception — waives conservative treatment
Post-operative evaluation within 6 months — waives conservative treatment
Red flag symptoms — waives conservative treatment
Isolated anterior knee pain without mechanical symptoms or instability
Repeat MRI within 12 months without change, failed intervention, or preop planning

extraction_schema._comment: This is auto-derived from canonical_rules. Every field referenced in any rule condition above must appear here. The descriptions come from the domain registry.
extraction_schema.icd10_code: ICD-10 diagnosis code(s) documented in chart supporting medical necessity
extraction_schema.mcmurray_test: Positive McMurray's test documented on physical examination
extraction_schema.thessaly_test: Positive Thessaly test documented on physical examination
extraction_schema.joint_line_tenderness: Joint line tenderness WITH mechanical symptoms (locking, catching, or giving way)
extraction_schema.persistent_effusion: Persistent joint effusion present for more than 4 weeks
extraction_schema.lachman_test: Positive Lachman test documented on physical examination
extraction_schema.anterior_posterior_drawer: Positive anterior or posterior drawer test documented on physical examination
extraction_schema.varus_valgus_instability: Instability documented on varus or valgus stress testing
extraction_schema.restricted_rom_mechanical_block: Restricted range of motion with a documented mechanical block
extraction_schema.xray_completed: Weight-bearing radiographs of the affected knee completed
extraction_schema.xray_report_available: Radiograph report available in the medical record
extraction_schema.pt_completed: Physical therapy completed (minimum 6 sessions with licensed PT)
extraction_schema.nsaid_trial: NSAIDs or oral analgesics trial completed (minimum 4 weeks)
extraction_schema.activity_modification: Activity modification and documented home exercise program
extraction_schema.bracing_orthotics: Bracing, orthotics, or assistive devices used
extraction_schema.injection: Intra-articular injection completed (corticosteroid or hyaluronic acid)
extraction_schema.pediatric_ortho_eval: Pediatric orthopedic evaluation by board-certified/eligible pediatric orthopedic surgeon
extraction_schema.growth_plate_assessment: Growth plate (physeal) assessment included in evaluation
extraction_schema.functional_impact_adl: Functional impact on activities of daily living documented
extraction_schema.inability_bear_weight: Inability to bear weight at time of evaluation
extraction_schema.suspected_ligament_rupture: Suspected complete rupture of major ligament (ACL, PCL, MCL, or LCL)
extraction_schema.displaced_meniscal_tear: Clinical findings consistent with displaced meniscal tear (locked knee)
extraction_schema.post_op_evaluation: Post-operative evaluation required within 6 months of knee surgery
extraction_schema.suspected_tumor: Suspected primary or metastatic tumor of bone or soft tissue
extraction_schema.suspected_occult_fracture: Suspected occult fracture not visualized on X-ray
extraction_schema.no_clinical_indication: No clinical indication or symptoms — routine screening only
extraction_schema.mechanical_symptoms_absent: Mechanical symptoms (locking, catching, giving way) are NOT present
extraction_schema.repeat_mri_within_12mo: This is a repeat MRI within 12 months of prior MRI
extraction_schema.no_clinical_status_change: No documented change in clinical status since prior MRI
extraction_schema.no_failed_intervention: No failed intervention since prior imaging
